verses.verse: And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> the <S%H2374>seer<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6440>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>, Shouldest thou <S%H5826>help<s%> the <S%H7563>ungodly<s%>, and <S%H157>love<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? <S%H2063>therefore<s%> is <S%H7110>wrath<s%> upon thee from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H61>Nevertheless<s%> there are <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in thee, in that thou hast taken <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H842>groves<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and hast <S%H3559>prepared<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> through the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and brought them <S%H7725>back<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>. he went: Heb. he returned and went out
And he <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> throughout all the <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H5892>city<s%> by <S%H5892>city<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8199>judges<s%>, Take <S%H7200>heed<s%> what ye <S%H6213>do<s%>: for ye <S%H8199>judge<s%> not for <S%H120>man<s%>, but for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, who is with you in the <S%H1697>judgment<s%> <S%H4941><s%>. in: Heb. in the matter of judgment

Wherefore now let the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be upon you; take <S%H8104>heed<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> it: for there is no <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, nor <S%H4856>respect<s%> of <S%H6440>persons<s%>, nor <S%H4727>taking<s%> of <S%H7810>gifts<s%>.

Moreover in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> did <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and of the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and for <S%H7379>controversies<s%>, when they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he <S%H6680>charged<s%> them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H530>faithfully<s%>, and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And what <S%H7379>cause<s%> soever shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you of your <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>, between <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%>, between <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, ye shall even <S%H2094>warn<s%> them that they <S%H816>trespass<s%> not against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and so <S%H7110>wrath<s%> come upon you, and upon your <S%H251>brethren<s%>: <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, and ye shall not <S%H816>trespass<s%>.

And, behold, <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> is over you in all <S%H1697>matters<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>, the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, for all the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>matters<s%>: also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you. <S%H6213>Deal<s%> <S%H2388>courageously<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be with the <S%H2896>good<s%>. Deal: Heb. Take courage and do
